creator: florut.iulian@ssi-schaefer.ro
text:
I found this behavior: if I precompile the JSP files the JSP are loaded very 
slowly. If I don't precompile and I clear the tomcat cache the JSP are loaded 3 
or 4 times faster.

Marking as INVALID since pre-compiling is a widely used option in production
environments and this is not a known issue any more (at least on the latest
stable Tomcat releases).
creator: sriramnrn@gmail.com
